medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced 1 week of worsening abdominal pain described as sharp and intense, greater on the left than the right. She reported 2 episodes of emesis this morning, mostly clear with no gross blood, and 2 episodes of loose bowel movements with a small amount of blood. She denies current nausea and reported prior, less intense episodes of similar pain occurring as far back as unspecified date, lasting unspecified duration every unspecified months. She denied fever or chills until the morning of presentation when she became febrile in the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Remote history of anorexia; cosmetic right breast implant with later replacement.
medical_history.social_history: No tobacco use; occasional alcohol consumption.
